artist: Architect: McKim, Mead, and White; Architect: Charles Follen McKim; Architect: William Rutherford Mead; Architect: Stanford White
description: Architectural drawing of proposed design for the Minneapolis Institute of Arts.
inscription: At bottom center, Iin pencil: NORTH ELEVATION - PROPOSED BUILDING / MINNEAPOLIS MUSEUM OF FINE ARTS
medium: Pen and ink, ink wash and graphite on paper, mounted on board
provenance: McKim, Mead, and White, New York (architectural firm); presented to MIA, 1912.
title: North Elevation, Proposed Building, Minneapolis Museum of Fine Arts
